turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order three large thick crust pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings do you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If you could make one of them cheese, one of them a white pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And then I'll do sausage and pepperoni on the third.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You said you wanted 4 pizzas, what did you want on the last one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: sausage and pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you've only listed 3 types.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want just 3 instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Just do three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. i've changed the order to 3 pizzas. also, there is no white sauce pizza on the menu.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just make it another sausage and pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order is for 3 large pizzas with thick crust, 1 cheese, and 2 sausage and pepperoni pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep. Confirm the order, and let me know how much it is and when it's ready for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $35.55 is the total, did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, tell me when it's ready.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order has been placed. it'll be ready in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok bye.
